text: nihsandeh, hamane hee tauraat utaaree, jisamen maargadarshan tatha prakaash hai, jisake anusaar vo nabee nirnay karate rahe, jo aagyaakaaree the, unake lie jo yahoodee the tatha dharmaachaaree aur vidvaan log, kyonki ve allaah kee pustak ke rakshak banaaye gaye the aur usake (saty hone ke) saakshee the. atah, tumabhee logon se na daro, mujhee se daro aur meree aayaton ke badale tanik mooly na khareedo aur jo allaah kee utaaree (pustak ke) anusaar nirnay na karen, to vahee kaafir hain
